item.description:
The Gray Ghost Inn is located on picturesque Route 100 in Southern Vermont.

The Inn features a spacious lounge and a BYOB bar, where guests can relax by the fireplace or enjoy the company of others. Furthermore there is a game room with a pool table, ping-pong table, video games, TV and VCR as well as a library of books and movies and wireless internet is available as well.
 
Enjoy and relax in our outdoor hot tub, or the seasonal heated outdoor swimming pool where a perfect day has a perfect ending.

Breakfast included.

The name of the Inn has nothing to do with ghosts.....it is named after a fly fishing lure

www.grayghostinn.com

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Gray Ghost Overnight
